rukus.text: Abasya'i tomadera jan'ya rayeche rasulullahara madhye uttama ardasa [1], tara jan'ya ye asa rakhe allah o sesa dinera ebam allah‌ke besi smarana kare

Ara muminagana yakhana sam'milita bahinike dekhala, tara bale uthala, ’eta to ta'i, allah o tamra rasula yara pratisruti amaderake diyechilena ebam allah o tamra rasula satya'i balechena.' Ara ete tadera imana o anugatya'i brd'dhi pela

Muminadera madhye ke'u ke'u allah‌ra sathe tadera kara angikara purna kareche, tadera ke'u ke'u (angikara purna kare) mara geche [1] ebam ke'u ke'u pratiksaya rayeche. Tara tadera angikara kono paribartana kareni
yate allah puraskrta karena satyabadiderake tadera satyabaditara jan'ya ebam sasti dena munaphikaderake yadi tini cana athaba tadera ksama karena. Niscaya allah ksamasila, parama dayalu
Ara allah kaphiraderake trud'dhabasthaya phiriye dilena, tara kono kalyana labha kareni. Ara yud'dhe muminadera jan'ya allahi yathesta ebam allah sarbasaktimana, prabala parakramasali

Ara kitabidera [1] madhye yara taderake sahayya karechila, taderake tini tadera durga hate abatarana karalena ebam tadera antare bhiti sancara karalena; tomara tadera kichu sankhyakake hatya karacha ebam kichu sankhyakake karacha bandi
Ara tini tomaderake adhikari karalena tadera bhumi, gharabari o dhana - sampadera ebam emana bhumira yate tomara ekhano padarpana karani [1]. Ara allah sabakichura upara purna ksamatabana
